name: Biodiversity
infoText: Impact of projects on biodiversity conservation, calculated from indicators of endemism, land conservation/restoration, connectivity, and development of sustainable social projects.

name: Climate
infoText: Impact of projects that reduce carbon emissions from the land sector (deforestation/degradation), as wood and soil biomass as well as application of sustainable forest measures.

name: Water
infoText: Impact of projects  managing water cycling, quality and availability as well as the management of associated risks.

name: Community
infoText: Impact of projects on ensuring and improving equal and inclusive physical, mental, economic, and spiritual health.
